name: The Last Medic
description:
Bad news: Earth was just hit by an asteroid.
Good news: You survived!

As the last surviving medic, the faith of humankind lies in your hands. Or, something like that.

FEATURES


  • Jump, double-jump, jet, dash, and fast-fall (in any order). Your jetpack has a limited range, but it resets when you land on solid ground.
  • Explore 200+ levels across 18 different planets, each with their own unique visual and musical themes.
  • Quickly retry levels when you die, thanks to a multi-checkpoint system.
  • Enjoy a variety of originally composed music. You'll rarely hear the same tune twice.
  • Pilot a submarine-like personal craft through a handful of underwater levels.
  • Fly a hoverboard on one of the planets.
  • Discover various secrets and Easter eggs scattered throughout the galaxy.
  • Jump straight into the action! There's no hand-holding, no dialog, and no long text to read. The story is implied by the environment.
